attributes.action: Prevent developers adding 254 new houses to Ellon in Aberdeenshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Planning permission has been sought to build a raft of new homes with all the Planning gain money remaining ultimately in private hands.  Our local services are stretched to breaking point already, and with no new investment from the Develpers will be unable to cope with the estimated 650+ new residents.  The developement proposed will also result in loss of farmland and a significant number of tress and areas of historic woodland, home to some rare and endangered widlife flora and fauna.
